Course Description: THIS COURSE IS A COMPREHENSIVE COURSE PROVIDING STUDENTS WITH THE BASIC UNDERSTANDING OF UNDERLYING PRINCIPLES, THEORIES AND CONCEPTS GUIDING THE RECORDING AND ANALYSIS OF BUSINESS TRANSACTIONS, AND THE PREPARATION AND INTERPRETATION OF THE PRINCIPLE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS.  THIS COURSE GUIDES STUDENTS THROUGH THE COMPLETE ACCOUNTING CYCLE FOR A SERVICE AND MERCHANDISING BUSINESSES.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
